author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
The Myth of Chinese Long-Term Thinking https://chinauncensored.tv/programs/deepdive-long-term-thinking

China is facing a massive population collapse—and the Chinese Communist Party thinks it has a solution: taxing condoms.

As birthrates plummet and China’s population rapidly ages, the CCP is rolling out desperate new policies to try to force people into having more children. But instead of fixing the real problems—like a failing economy, crushing work culture, and skyrocketing costs of living—Beijing is turning to symbolic, short-sighted measures that could make things even worse.

In this episode of China Uncensored, we break down China’s demographic crisis, why the CCP’s “condom tax” is backfiring, how Chinese citizens are reacting online, and what this says about the Party’s inability to plan for the future. From rising STD rates to economic pressure and unintended consequences, this latest move exposes just how deep
title: China’s Population Crisis Is Worse Than They Admit
